titleNullable: Final Space Ratings and Viewership (3 seasons)
descriptionNullable:
### Context

I just heard the news that there will be no season 4 so let's have a look at the data to see if that decision was justified.


### Content

In this dataset you will find the IMBd ratings for each episode as well as the number of people who watched them in the U.S.

### Acknowledgements

Data was collected from [https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6317068/](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6317068/) as well as [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Final_Space_episodes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Final_Space_episodes).

### Inspiration

I loved season 1 but I found the show progressively harder to watch in season 3. Maybe it is for the best there will be no season 4 but it is still sad.
title: Final Space Ratings and Viewership (3 seasons)
subtitle: IMBd ratings and US views
description:
### Context

I just heard the news that there will be no season 4 so let's have a look at the data to see if that decision was justified.


### Content

In this dataset you will find the IMBd ratings for each episode as well as the number of people who watched them in the U.S.

### Acknowledgements

Data was collected from [https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6317068/](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt6317068/) as well as [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Final_Space_episodes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Final_Space_episodes).

### Inspiration

I loved season 1 but I found the show progressively harder to watch in season 3. Maybe it is for the best there will be no season 4 but it is still sad.
